mapper.sql: SELECT A.COURT_DONG_CODE, A.SIDO_NM, A.SIGUNGU_NM, A.COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM, A.COURT_RI_NM, A.POLYGON_DATA FROM T_ADDR_COURTDONG_POLYGON A
mapper.select: SELECT COURT_DONG_CODE, SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM, COURT_RI_NM FROM ( SELECT A.COURT_DONG_CODE, A.SIDO_NM, A.SIGUNGU_NM, A.COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM, A.COURT_RI_NM, ACP.POLYGON_DATA FROM ( SELECT B.COURT_DONG_CODE , B.SIDO_NM , B.SIGUNGU_NM , B.COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM , B.COURT_RI_NM , COUNT(1) CNT FROM ( SELECT SIDO, SIGUNGU FROM T_EXCEL_UPLOAD_DATA A WHERE EXCEL_KEY = #{excelKey} LIMIT 1 ) A, ( SELECT COURT_DONG_CODE, SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM, COURT_RI_NM FROM T_ADDR_JIBUN A ) B WHERE A.SIDO = B.SIDO_NM AND A.SIGUNGU = B.SIGUNGU_NM GROUP BY B.COURT_DONG_CODE , B.SIDO_NM , B.SIGUNGU_NM , B.COURT_UPMYUNDONG_NM , B.COURT_RI_NM ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ADDR_COURTDONG_POLYGON ACP ON ( A.COURT_DONG_CODE = ACP.COURT_DONG_CODE AND A.COURT_RI_NM = ACP.COURT_RI_NM ) ) B WHERE IFNULL(POLYGON_DATA, '') = ''
